title: VPN use surges in UK as new online safety rules kick in
author: mmarian
aiHeadline: UK citizens scramble to hide their digital footprints as government's new 'safety' measures prove more intrusive than expected.

title: Copyparty – Turn almost any device into a file server
author: saint11
aiHeadline: Transform your devices into file-sharing fiends with Copyparty, because who doesn't want a LAN party in their living room?

title: ‘I witnessed war crimes’ in Gaza – former worker at GHF aid site [video]
author: nathanyz
aiHeadline: Former aid worker speaks out: 'I saw things that made me question humanity' – but don't worry, the video is just 10 minutes long.

title: Visa and Mastercard are getting overwhelmed by gamer fury over censorship
author: mrzool
aiHeadline: Gamers unleash fury on Visa and Mastercard, proving that when you mess with their games, you mess with their passion – and their wallets.

title: Show HN: Use Their ID – Use Your Local UK MP's ID for the Online Safety Act
author: timje1
aiHeadline: UK residents find creative use for their MPs' IDs: bypassing online safety laws, because who needs their own ID when you've got your elected officials'?
